Battle against time, get points and sick combos as you fight to survive as long as possible! You wont be able to stop swiping in this intense, dynamic level. You'll need to develop ninja-like reflexes if you want to get far in this game.  

~ Enjoy ~ 
Experience a stereoscopic-3D game unlike any that you have ever seen. This game takes full advantage of your screen's 3D capabilities, you wont believe the incredible depth in the level.  

 ~ Explode ~ 
Annihilate the level and reach new high scores with any of the Game's several traps including : 
- The Wormhole (Suck the tiles into a vortex instead of swiping them!) 
- TNT (Blow the crap out of the level!)  Whats Next?  We have a lot more planned for this game that we hope to share with future flightdeck users! This is only the beginning!

name: Turbo Chess
summary: Chess game developed by Artic Computing for MSX-based machines.

name: Tuk Tuk Taxi
summary: Tuk Tuk Taxi is an exciting game that lets you experience the thrill of being a tuk tuk driver in a bustling city.

name: Turbulence: Airplane Survival Simulator
summary: In this simulator, when your airplane enters a massive storm, you aren't a passenger anymore. You are a survivor. Trapped at 35,000 feet, you need to keep a cool head and act fast to live through the crisis. Can you make it to a happy landing?

name: Turquoise Mars
summary: Turquoise Mars is a one-player fighting game inspired in part by Capcom's Warzard/Red Earth.

name: Tumble Wrestling
summary:
Tumble Wrestling is a casual physics based fighting game that challenges you to knock your opponent out of the ring.
There is a variety of wrestlers to chose from, each with a pro wrestling signature move that can be used to weaken or KO your opponent. Use power slams, irish whips, elbow drops, atomic drops, pile drivers and moves off the ropes to earn that win!
Early challengers will start out easy, but will become increasingly difficult as you fight your way to a title bout. As the game becomes more difficult, you must decide whether to go for the raw power ring out, or methodically pound your foe into into a daze and then go for the ring out. Let the mayhem begin!

name: Turnabout Steampunk
summary: It is an Ace Attorney RPG in a steampunk world of magic power and steam machines, by SophiaSW and RabbitonBooks.Trucy Wright, lived with her baker farther in Phoenix Town, the most remote little town in the Fey Kingdom. One day, Detective Ema visited the Wright Bakery during her investigation to a neighboring country...and Trucy decided to travel along as her assistant. A lost treasure, murder cases, airships, cities faraway...in this vast and exciting world, what lies in the end of their journey?

name: Turnabout Tomorrow
summary: All mEn fall...

name: Turn the Line!
summary: Turn the Line is a co-op tycoon game on the PC Steam platform where 1-4 players complete a dessert. Cute characters and simple controls, but difficult difficulty! Anyone can get started, but not everyone can do it perfectly! Challenge perfection for the rabbit's leaving work on time!

name: Tunic GBC
summary: Explore the land filled with secrets, monsters and ancient ruins in this bite-sized demake.

name: Turntablist: DJ Battle
summary: Turntablist: DJ Battle is an Action game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Tuboflex
summary: Year 2010. The need for flexible labor has grown exponentially since the beginning of the century. Today, the protections and bureaucracy of traditional staffing solutions aren't sustainable anymore: a single worker may be needed by different companies over the course of the same day. That's why Tuboflex inc., the world's leading Human Resources Services company, created a complex system of tubes that allow us to allocate employees in real time according to the market's demand. Playing the role of a Tuboflex employee, you have to survive this ultra-dynamic labour market, getting quickly used to the most disparate tasks. Welcome to the Tube Age.

name: Tundralia: The Frigid Frontier
summary: Tundralia is an RPG in which you play as a novice adventurer, seeking to find fame and fortune in a frozen wasteland. Explore a stylized open world, fight as one of three classes using traditional tab target combat, complete quests, delve into dungeons, and collect a plethora of equipment.

name: Turn-Based Kingdom: Ancient Egypt
summary: Turn-Based Kingdom is a turn-based economic strategy game.

name: Tuned to Your Heart
summary: Local music witch, Cinnamon, has been asked out by Freesia, a very cool ice witch. They've agreed to go eat dinner but Cinnamon has plans to make the date even better! But it has been a long time since she has been on a date! What do you even do on a date!?!?

name: Turtle Champs
summary: Play as a Turtle and duke it out in a game of Football. Use your gun to fly around the field or even shoot the ball.

name: Tube Adventures
summary:
First youtube game in the World.

The protagonist Eusebio has lost its memories and now you have to help him to find its way to the bakery.

name: Turn By Turn Villain
summary: Be the bad guy, do good: Play as a demon forced to walk the human world in this Turn-Based Action RPG! Engage your ex-minions in chaotic brawls! Choose your actions quickly from a classic menu but mind your Turn Points! Collect Light to dispel the darkness... your dark mess!

name: TurretCraft
summary: Build maze, send units, destroy your opponents! TurretCraft is a fast paced, competitive tower defense game with multiplayer, mazing, and mercenaries.

name: Tunneler
summary: Tunneler is the better known game by Geoffrey Silverton (the other one is Popgames). Two players using the same keyboard and the same screen each control an underground tank. Goal is to find and destroy the opponent's tank. Since only small part of the map is displayed on the split screen, you might actually have some searching to do.

name: Tunnel Terror
summary: A Tempest inspired game written by Eric Popejoy and published by Adventure International for the Apple II.

name: Tutenstone
summary: In Tutenstone, you play as an adventurer who has discovered an ancient pyramid filled with valuable treasures. However, many treasures are hidden behind stone blocks that need to be destroyed.

name: Turbo-Trex By Orazio Cacciola
summary:
Mom Trex has to go and save her little one, kidnapped by his archenemy who wants revenge after the last lost battle. You will have to cross the desert plain, full of angry Pterodactyls, who do not hesitate to jump on you. After that, she will have to go through the big forest, where the Swift Raptors will be waiting for her, they also hate the Trex. She and finally she will have to go through the valley of volcanoes and she will have to be very careful of the fireballs raining down from the sky. At the end of this long journey, you will arrive in the home of the enemy, a large carnivore, where you will face the fight to the death.

Our Trex will have to avoid all the obstacles that she will find on the way throughout the journey. She will have the ability to defend herself against enemies by spitting a flame of fire from her mouth, which range will be short range, so she will have to throw it when the enemy is close. The more enemies she knocks down, the more energy she will accumulate to be able to last longer in the final battle.

name: Turbo Force
summary: Anti-gravity racing game with online competitions, hardcore driving mechanics, and a track editor.

name: Turbo Girl
summary: Cross the different levels avoiding to be demolished by the ship-robots and finish every "Elder" which all of them are protecting. The game consists of three levels very differentiated, and each one is divided as well in several parts that will allow you to continue from one of them when beaten.

name: Turbo Esprit
summary:
Turbo Esprit puts you in control of a Lotus Esprit cop car, with the challenge of breaking up a drugs gang and protecting the innocent. 
 
A map is built into the car, which can instantly show the positions of the baron's cars - this is crucial because you can't interrupt them before the initial deal is done, as this will simply make them leave and try again another time.

name: Tuxemon
summary: Tuxemon is a free, open source monster-fighting RPG. Tuxemon aims to create an open source game with its own unique style that sets it apart from other monster fighting RPGs.

name: Tube Be Continued
summary: Prepare for a tube-based, puzzle-filled, HAM-PACKED VR adventure with our charismatic hamster leader: The BOSS. Here at TUBE Industries we provide the puzzles, and you provide… the brains. No shady business here!

name: Turnin' Tail
summary: Use the power of perspective to find the animals that escaped from the pet store!

name: Turte
summary: Turte is a simple yet engaging game where players click on a turtle to increase their score. With straightforward mechanics and an easy-to-understand interface, Turte offers an enjoyable experience for players of all ages.

name: Turtle Rush
summary:
Easy! Fun! Turtle Rush!
When turtle is on rush, just break everything.
Easy and Fun! Relieve your Stress with your Turtle.

name: Tuna The Cat
summary: Inspired by side scrollers from the 80's and 90's, Tuna The Cat is a true jump style side scroller. With todays graphics and yesterdays playstyle it's a combination for fun. Jump, slide, and run your way through 20 stages of colorful 2.5D excitement.

name: Turbeton
summary: Turbeton is a competitive multiplayer game in which two players go head-to-head, waging a strategic fight for control of the Afterlife.

name: Turf War
summary:
Four rat-looking characters in a black & white world throwing diverse items at each other, such as bee hives, paint buckets, boomerangs, eggs, etc.
Similar to Worms in gameplay.

name: Tunnel Rush
summary: An exhilarating ride down a twisty turny tunnel filled with devilish obstacles to avoid. Test your reflexes and enhance your mind!

name: Tuga Boy Adventures
summary: Ready for an awesome adventure? Have fun around the world with Tuga Boy, the most adventurous turtle!

name: Tube
summary: Players race down a tube in space, trying to reach the end of the stage before time runs out while navigating an optimal route, avoiding obstacles, and avoiding or destroying enemies. Optionally, two players can race against each other in a split screen view.

name: Turret Syndrome
summary: Tower Defense game in first person view, it can be played in VR with Oculus Rift or in non VR.

name: Turnabout Divergence
summary:
You know that trial where Phoenix lost his badge?
What if you throw in a couple of deus-ex-machinas that cause him to uh, well, not lose said badge.
He's still in a bit of a jam, though. It's not going to be that easy.

name: Turkey Fling
summary: Get ready for a gobbling good time! Watch out for the many hazards along the way like pointy-pointy forks, burning candles, gooey pies, steaming gravy and jelly traps. Oh yeah, watch the re-entry from space or you’ll end up a crispy mess.

name: Tunnel Racer
summary: LDJAM42 - Running out of space

name: Turnabout Revolution
summary:
Four months after the events of Turnabout Substitution, Apollo finds himself defending an enigmatic shop owner accused of arson.

Meanwhile, Justice, a terrorist organization seeking to change a corrupt judicial system through violent means, has claimed its twelvth victim.

Desperate for clues, the police are left with no choice but to release a convicted murderer Apollo knows only too well from prison, hoping he will give them the information they need on Justice.

Planned to be 4 phases, but only 1-3 was completed

When those two stories intersect, the case soon takes a turn for the tragic, uncovering dark secrets from the past and leaving a permanent mark in the history of the courts.

The time for Revolution has come.

name: Turnabout of the Golden Witch
summary:
Two unlikely lawyers step into the ring.

Whose logic will reign supreme?

An Ace Attorney fan game starring Battler Ushiromiya and Beatrice, the Golden Witch. As your client's appointed attorney, it is up to you to defend her from the golden prosecutor's assault. With the stage of battle firmly rooted in the world of human logic, will Battler finally defeat the Golden Witch?

name: Turmoil
summary: Turmoil is a 3D isometric top-down action roguelike game. Inspired by a dieselpunk aesthetic, navigate a winding factory space filled with environmental hazards and hostile robot workers with the goal of survival. Rise from the ashes! Show the boss that a worker is more than their mechanical parts.

name: Turrican
summary: Game Boy port of Turrican.

name: Turbo Sprint
summary: Turbo Sprint is based on the classic arcade game Super Sprint. The game features 8 tracks that range in difficulty, up to four players can take control of either a Blue, Red, Yellow or Green car. Cars that are not controlled by players are computer controlled. When all 8 tracks have been completed the game loops back to the first track but the difficulty is increased with various obstacles and increased speed of the computer controlled cars. New players have the opportunity to join a race after each track has been completed.

name: Turbo Driving Racing 3D
summary: Conquer street and sky in Turbo Driving Racing, a mix of high-octane driving and endless racing. Barrel through packed streets, avoid crashes, take down traffic cars, pick up coins and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts! The game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans.

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Tech Jet Supporters Pack
summary: Level up your look and prepare to tear up the fairways with the legendary Tech Jet Supporters Pack.

name: Turbo Battle Tanks
summary: Local multiplayer Tank confrontation

name: Tunnel Bird
summary: This is a small, racing game in which you control a bird.

name: Turbulence
summary: Help Joseph-Michel and his dog, Bart, to drive their hot air balloon. You need to catch every propane balloon in order to keep the balloon flying. But watch out the flying bombs! You can only make the balloon go up or down. The balloon will move right or left depending on the air flows.

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Furry Friends Kit
summary: This one is for our furry friends!

name: Turret Girl
summary: Turret Girl is a romantic visual novel about her struggles to find love and acceptance in a hostile world, with a Match3 Jewels mini-game to break up the action.

name: Turboroko: Passion Fever
summary: A post apocalyptic murder mystery.

name: Turbo Trucks
summary:
Turbo Trucks is an aggressive, no-holds-barred race to the finish line featuring a line up of some seriously mean vehicles.

Set across winding woodland courses and remote desert canyons, you get to choose from a selection of gorgeous trucks and take on opponents in successive races to earn coveted trophies in the tournaments, or hone your driving skills in the quick races and time trials. Win the tournaments to gain access to more courses and trucks!

Ram, smash and spin your opponents off the track while perfecting your racing line to gain the upper hand. Anything goes!

name: Turbo Speed Jet Racing: Super Bike Challenge Game
Turbotron
summary: A 7DRL turn-based twist on classic arcade action

name: Turpin
summary: Japanese Tomy Pyuuta title, part number 004E, released in 1982.

name: Turbo Island Purger
summary:
Become a professional Island Cleaner. Your job is to eliminate Rebellious Scrap. Each attempt to save the world presents a new randomly generated challenge: you will face number of unique robots - which you will choose yourself.

The atmospheric islands that you will be traversing will also be completely new - they are procedurally generated each time.

name: Tuk Ruk
summary:
A fast-paced 2D action/puzzle platformer with four different playable characters. The grandson of Lost Vikings and Lemmings.

Use the unique skills of the four characters as you explore the jungle, tracking down the absent-minded Zooks and guiding them to safety.

name: Turnabout Remembrances
summary: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves...

name: Turf Battles: Triumphus
summary: Turf Battles is a 3D MMORPG. Players are able to create new characters and choose between 1 of 5 classes. Players work together in Tribes/Guilds to take dominion of resource filled Turfs/Islands.

name: Turtle Lu
summary: Turtle Lu is an old-school Action-Adventure game, Explore immense 2D Zones.

name: Tubular Rift
summary: Tubular Rift: In the far-flung future race on different planets. In old tubes meant to hit the rift. The rift being another dimension parallel to our own. The rewards are great! The consequences are even greater!

name: Tuya
summary: The protagonist returns to his parents' house in a hurry after hearing the news of his grandfather's death, and there he meets a terrifying sight!

name: Turkey, Please!
summary: It is Thanksgiving Day, and you are looking forward to a delicious turkey dinner with all the fixings. But it won't happen on its own! With your cousins tearing around the house, Uncle Leon trying to watch the game, and your little brother being his usual annoying self, dinner may never be ready. Looks like it's up to YOU to save the holiday!

name: Turbo Champ
summary: Turbo Champ is a fast-paced, arcade racing game. Unlock unique cars in the single-player campaign, or play online and locally with your friends. Will you be the world's next Turbo Champ?

name: Tunnels of Fahad
summary: An action game written by Kathy Pfeiffer and published by Adventure International for TRS-80.

name: Turtle Bridge
summary: Turtle Bridge is a widescreen Game & Watch video game released in 1982 by Nintendo. In the game, you must get the character from one side of a lake to the other by jumping on the shells of turtles that are protruding from the water. If you jump on a turtle at the wrong time, then you will have to go back to the beginning. The fact that the turtles gain your character access to the other side of the lake is where the game's name originates from.

name: Tuffy the Corgi and the Tower of Bones
summary: Tuffy the Corgi shall climb the Tower of Bones. We can't tell you why: that would be a spoiler. Get to the top. Try to pick up all 108 bones along the way! If you touch one enemy or spike, it's game over. Be careful!

name: Tuttle: Star Flower Harvest
summary: Tuttle: Star Flower Harvest: become a space flower farmer, fight off pests, learn new skills, and find out the secrets of the Starflowers! Your actions shape the Galaxies. Dig in now!

name: Tump Jump
summary: Tump Jump is relaxing 2D platformer with easy gameplay and lots of fun!

name: Tutti Frutti
summary: A collect 'em up written by Alan M. Newman for the Atari 8-bit systems and published by Adventure International.

name: Tulips & Windmills
summary: Hoi! Ensure your windmill runs consistently and your tulip fields are harvested. This clicker game will bring you closer to the iconic Dutch culture. Expect random events and make use of upgrades to increase your tulip wealth! Veel succes!

name: Turnabout Turnabout
summary: A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away, but also not really because it takes place in our world, except it's not our world because California is Japanese and the court system is different, but also it's very similar to ours except for that, except for the fact that ghosts are real, but they don't know they're ghosts, so it's kinda like the Sixth Sense, except people don't just see dead people out of nowhere, you have to train to be able to see dead people...

name: Turn Chase
summary: Reach the exit avoiding enemies chasing you in turn based system!

name: TubeTwist: Quantum-Flux Edition
summary: After things go awry in Professor Jaymour's laboratory, the professor is lost in a time warp and it is up to a handful of students to free her. To do this the player must reconstruct her experiments by connecting a series of tubes.

name: Tutututu: Tea party
summary: You got the tea? If not then you should get it. In a bizarre world of TUTUTUTU - tea party God forbade any tea and to remind people about this prohibition God removed lips from all faces.

name: Turn up jeans
summary: Turn up jeans - This game is created to improve the skills of owning a mouse and keyboard.

name: Turnip
summary: Exploration farming game with a lot of turnips. Explore the turnip realm and find turnips to grow furniture. Music by Laurie Spiegel

name: TumbleWeed
summary: An inventive merge of classic tower defense and roguelike looting. Towers are loot! Tower enhancements are loot! Consumables are loot! Adapt and use your resources wisely to make it to the end!

name: Tug of War
summary: A simple one-button clicker game. Play a tug-of-war as a witch trying to use cute cats as her familiars! The pixel-style pictures and lively 8-bit music are the attractive points.

name: Tumbledrop
summary: A physics-based puzzle game featuring anthropomorphic shapes.

name: TuHou Remilia: Begin of Scarlet Family
summary: Play as a powerful vampire and make your family stronger by doing the work of your men!

name: Tums: Battle of the Burn
summary: A boxing game based on the antacid product Tums.

name: Tuna Rice
summary: Tuna Rice is a silly little VN about warm and fluffy... tuna rice !

name: Tumble Baby
summary: Change the world so your baby can live!

name: Turis Station
summary: Turis Station is pulp sci-fi multiverse. Take control of your Auton's story and augment their life. Join thousands online and meet their Autons. Featuring: Farming, Dungeons, Space and Live Events

name: Tuper Tario Tros.
summary: A Flash platformer combining the mechanics of Super Mario Bros. and Tetris.

name: Turrim 3D
summary: A First Person Slasher Where You Eat Hearts

name: Turbo Sliders
summary: Turbo Sliders is a top down view 2D PC racer. This page contains data for all cars, tracks, modes and community mods for the game.

name: Turbo Boom!
summary: Hop into Turbo Boom! to go rally racing on obstacle courses lined with explosive obstacles. Easy to drive slow, but do you have the skills to set records? The nerves to risk everything for that extra hundredth second?

name: Turbo Kids
summary:
Partake in the crazy Turbo Kids tournament and win the ultimate prizes!
An amazing journey full of fantasy and excitement! Turbo Kids are competing outdoors to win ultimate prize. Join in the tournament to see what Turbo Kids can bring you!

name: Turning Red Dancing Tiles Hop
summary: Welcome to turning red with these new tiles revealed for tiles hop. If you love jumping ball games and,dancing with Mei Lee and her mother's obedient daughter and the chaos of her game, then you will love this game. It's very fun and time-killing, river dance, jump-ball with turning red and Mei Lee dance hop Tiles is one among the foremost widespread games.

name: Turret Sector
summary: Turret Sector is an action packed 3D tower defence game and top down shooter.

name: Turf Memories
summary: Turf Memories is a Sports game, published by Bec, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Tunnel Tail
summary: Tunnel Tail is an RPG where players control the members of the Mouse Tribe as they struggle against the influence of the wicked Lumini.

name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad
summary: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad is a high-velocity action game featuring the super-charged crew of characters from the upcoming film. Each playable character has their own signature street style and tricked-out skills which will come in handy when showing-off and earning respect with jumps, drifts, grinds, flips and other super-cool stunt moves. Expert skills will also prove useful to earn power-ups, customize your character, win competitive challenges and discover shortcuts in the dynamic larger-than-life environments of Turbo's world.

name: Turrican Collector's Edition
summary:
Welcome back… to Turrican! In the Turrican Anthology Vol 1 & 2.

The Turrican Collection includes:
Turrican Anthology Vol. 1
- Turrican (Amiga)
- Turrican 2 (Amiga)
- Super Turrican (SNES)
- Super Turrican Director's Cut (SNES)
- Mega Turrican Score Attack (Mega Drive)
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 2

Turrican 3 (Amiga)
- Mega Turrican (Mega Drive)
- Mega Turrican Director's Cut (Mega Drive)
- Super Turrican 2 (SNES)
- Super Turrican 1 Score Attack (SNES)

The Collector's Edition contains:
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 1 Game for Nintendo Switch
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 2 Game for Nintendo Switch
- Collector's box with magnetic latch
- Turrican Documentary (BluRay)
- Soundtrack
- Art Book
- Sticker Sheet
- 4 Acrylic Art Cards
- 2 Large reversible Posters
- Enamel Pin
- Signed Postcard (Print)
- Approximate size of the Ultra Collector's Edition box: 22cm x 16cm x 7,5cm (8,7 x 6,3 x 3 Inches)

name: Turn-Based Champion
summary: Turn-Based Champion is a rpg party game where you and your friends compete in minigames and take on monsters and bosses through turn-based battles to compete for the title of Champion.

name: Tux Racer
summary: Tux Racer is a 2000 open-source winter sports racing video game starring the Linux mascot, Tux the penguin. It was originally developed by Jasmin Patry as a computer graphics project in a Canadian university.

name: Tulgey Wood
summary: Tulgey Wood is a magical adventure game inspired by the classic tale of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Tuning Champions
summary: Tuning Champions is a PvP Multiplayer Racing Game where you have to earn money by racing to upgrade your vehicle and beat the others! Featuring full vehicle tuning, low poly style and a lot of fun! Earn money and upgrade your vehicle to beat the others!

name: Turbo Town
summary:
Did you miss him? Yeah, don't answer that...
Join Mr. Business on his quest to overcome his daddy issues by overcompensating for absolutely everything! Build the biggest town with the longest towers and most materialistic materials! Watch each building automatically consume and produce a variety of resources! The only finger you'll ever have to raise is your index finger, because exercise is a waste of time meant for the unwashed masses! Wallow in narcissism and shower yourself with boosts that come from the most golden of chests, then fill the hole in your heart by equipping them to buildings! Feel the joy of being Mr. Business' totally not imaginary subordinate, because you're the only thing keeping him from realizing he's another piece of detritus slowly spiraling around the toilet bowl of life!

name: Tube Baby
summary:
Control the test-tube in which the sperm meet the ovum to create a baby!
Addictive gravity balance game include 60 levels!

name: Turn It Around
summary: Turn It Around is a compilation game of 24 mini-games, each with their own set of goals. To complete them, the player must use the stylus on the touch screen to turn a wheel, each will test the players speed, power and technique for each.

name: Turbo Tanks
summary: TurboTanks is a dynamic tank game with turbo tanks and bouncing cannonballs.

name: Turbo Subs
summary: A super-charged sequel to the hit time management game Turbo Pizza, Turbo Subs is twice the fun, twice the challenge, with twice as much speed. Hit the kitchen running as Rebecca and Robert continue their pursuit of building the greatest restaurant franchise in town. Except now they find themselves in a much bigger town, New York City! With loads of upgrades, secret sauces, and unique tastes, Turbo Subs is a delicious new adventure for the whole family!

name: Turbo Trio
summary: Released on a physical copy by Elephant Entertainment (a division of THQ), this compilation brings together all of the Turbo games in one CD rom.

name: Tuition Academia
summary:
Tuition Academia is a life simulator game where you take control of a female protagonist. You're tasked with the goal of paying off your student debt any way you can, whilst balancing the day-to-day of college. It's a perverted world out there, and you can either use it, or it can use you!

This eroge combines roleplaying elements with an open world that lets you play any way you want. Your main character will slowly become more corrupt as they try to earn a seemingly insurmountable amount of money. They'll become more open to risqué and higher-paying jobs, and who knows what kind of person they'll become with a career path like that?

name: Tunnel Vision
summary:
Trapped on a sabotaged train speeding toward a tunnel with a bomb, an heiress struggles to stop the train in time. Save the passengers and escape the train car before it's too late. The clock is ticking!

A 2D first-person point-and-click adventure game with nostalgic low-res CGA 4-color graphics.

name: Turbo Pulse Race
summary: In the game, when you drift, you increase your level with the points you earn and unlock cars accordingly. With fast and fluid gameplay, your mistakes might not leave cars behind you.

name: Turf
summary:
In Turf there are thousands of zones spread out in cities and villages around the world. You compete for these zones against others in order to play the game.

By walking/running/biking to a zone and standing within its boundaries for a short while, you will take the zone from the previous owner and claim ownership. This action will turn the zone green and provide you with income in the form of points.

On the in-game map you are not only able to see zones and zone details. You can also watch your competitors move around live, making a strategy possible. You can choose to be invisible, but while taking a zone you must be visible to others.

name: TunTun
summary: COME ON DOWN!! If you live for chaotic numskully activities while trying to survive with your pals, then the tunnels might be right for you.

name: Tuca Quest
summary: Tuca Quest follows the titular Tuca (Lactuca Optima) as he gets sent on an adventure against United States President Joe Biden. Tuca constantly finds himself in new and bizarre locations throughout his quest. You'll have to make many decisions which will alter your playthrough. Can you get the true Tuca ending?

name: Turk-A-Lurk
summary: Turk-A-Lurk is a 2D Metroidvania precision platformer. Explore a large open world with 5 unique biomes. 100+ collectables to find. Multiple upgrades to unlock allowing new areas to be reached and easier movement. 20+ timed bonus levels to test your skills in. Full original soundtrack. Indie game.

name: Tux Typing
summary: Tux Typing is a free and open source typing tutor created especially for children. It features several different types of game play, at a variety of difficulty levels. It is designed to be fun and to improve words per minute speed of typists.

name: Tupã
summary: A small archer faces a wizard.

name: TurretMaster
summary: An invading army that does not stop. One survivor that can turn coffee creamer into a flame thrower and junk metal into shells. Defend the land against ground and air threats and move up the ranks. Become a creator with the level editor and challenge friends from all over the world with your own visions of an impossible invasion.

name: Turok
summary: A jungle style map with overgrown temple like structures and a smattering of high-tech and alien hive locations.

name: Turnabout Trickery
summary: Taking place in the canon of Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney.

name: Tunnel Assault
summary: “Pilot your spaceship through unyielding tunnels, dodging obstacles, and unleashing dual lasers in this procedurally generated, fast-paced adventure. Upgrade your arsenal as you advance, race against time, and emerge as the ultimate tunnel ace!”

name: Turn on All the Lights
summary: Turn on all the lights is a minimalist puzzle game that features a recursive mechanics in which the player has to explore micro pieces to connect a circuit and solve the main puzzle.

name: Turbo Squad
summary: Multiplayer turn-based platform game

name: Tusks: The Orc Dating Sim
summary: Tusks: The Orc Dating Sim focuses on a newly-formed family of gay orcs who are traveling from the annual orcish assembly to the Highlands of a semi-mythical Scotland!

name: Tuda:Kuda
summary: Fight the infected, explore the locations, collect everything you need for the plane and escape from this dying place.

name: TurnSkull
summary: TurnSkull is a turn-based puzzle game in which you collect items and use them to defeat all the creatures in each level. You only have 4 item slots and the order in which you pick up items and engage creatures matters, so think carefully.

name: Tunnels Under Yorion
summary: Tunnels under Yorion is a classic roguelike that rewards exploration and player skill during short runs (sometimes just 20 minutes). Fight monsters using turn-based hack-and-slash combat, explore procedurally-generated dungeons, and manage your inventory of weapons and magic items.

name: Turbo Boost Racing
summary: Turbo Boost Racing is a fun, fast-paced arcade style driving game with 4 exciting game modes!

name: Tunescape
summary: CREATE a Tunescape for any song you like, or just make a spot to chill and listen to music. ANIMATE the objects you place to create an immersive music video. SHARE your Tunescape with others, and view what they've made!

name: Tux, of Math Command
summary: “Tux, of Math Command” lets kids hone their arithmetic skills while they defend penguins from incoming comets, or offers them a chance to explore the asteroid belt with only their factoring abilities to bring them through safely!

name: Turf Hero
summary: Turf Hero is a Sports game, published by Tecmo, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Turtle Bridge
summary:
A fan-made remake of the classic Game and Watch game Turtle Bridge.

Carry the package to the awaiting truck by jumping across the turtle’s backs. Watch out as they may dive for a snack!

name: Turok: Evolution
summary: The story begins in 1886. Captain Tobias Bruckner's cavalry crushes the Saquin Nation. Tal'Set, the only survivor, confronts Bruckner in a duel to the death. A sudden mystical door appears and plunges them into darkness. The door leads Tal'Set into the Lost Lands. There he meets the River People. Djunn, the tribe's greatest warrior, agrees to aid Tal'Set in his quest.

name: Tunnels & Trolls
summary: Tunnels & Trolls is the second ever fantasy role playing game published. A fantasy role playing game is a game where a leader, usually known as the gamemaster, has created an adventure for a group of friends, and the friends play the game and try to solve the problem or rescue the princess or kill the dragon or whatever. Ken St Andre read and tried to understand That Other Fantasy RPG, and decided that he could invent one that was easier to understand and so T&T was born, over 30 years ago. The game has gone through several editions since then, but it remains popular and is played all over the world. A group of five of us created the latest version: the Deluxe Tunnels & Trolls.

name: Tumiki Fighters
summary: Tumiki Fighters is a freeware side-scrolling shooter where the player controls a toy-plane, attempting to destroy enemy toy ships as they advance from the right side of the screen.

name: Turtle Invaders
summary: The turtles have decided to take over the underwater Aqua world. The fearless Octoremus has decided to fight back!! In order to stop the turtles, Octoremus must ink the turtles, which magically transport them back to their own lair. The turtles, of course, can fight back.

name: Tuiterland 3 Definitive Edition
summary:
Everything you need to know about Tuiterland 3, the biggest playable parody on social media!
The Definitive Edition is an updated version of the game released on February 2nd 2023 that fixes bugs and adds some changes and new content to the game detailed in a txt file.

name: Turbo Snow Skiing
summary: Ski your way through several snow covered mountain levels as fast as you can but be careful to land on your skis or you will wipeout with ragdoll physics. Tilt your device to lean your rider and perform flips. Press the turbo button to fire up the jet turbine attached to your skis for a burst of speed. Hit the nitro turbo boost canisters all around the levels for an even greater speed burst. Navigate your way to the finish line using hidden ice caves for shortcuts. Try the stunt levels which test your skills in performing as many backflips or frontflips as you can. Find and unlock hidden levels throughout the game.

name: Tuition
summary: Placed in an abandoned university plagued by the undead - your goal is to escape the building, but the hordes of zombies only become increasingly difficult with time. Hurry and find new weapons and tools if you plan on making it out alive.

name: TurBot
summary: TurBot is a fast paced race to the finish where you'll combine a wide selection of movement options and power ups to reach the goal faster than anyone else!

name: Tunnel Vision
summary: TUNNEL VISION is a short story about two girls who go on a cave expedition searching for ghosts.

name: Turbo Wheels
summary: A racing game from Chundos Studio.

name: Turbo
summary: Racing game that leads you through several surroundings (e.g. cities, snowy landscapes, bridges, tunnels etc.).

name: Turtle Wax
summary: Adjust the height of the ladder to try to land on the target. Land on the target three times to win!

name: Tumbledown Drive
summary:
Drive, jump and honk your way to the top of this exceedingly punishing platformer.
Be careful, it's a long, long way down if you fall.
Includes controller support, a speedrun timer, regular secrets and secrets.

name: Turbo Bike Race
summary:
Offering free download only for Limited time!
Awesome motorbike game for iphone and iPad where you can compete with other players and friends through 34 different levels. Feel the adrenaline while making flips and riding lightening bikes and boost your speed by getting those extra power boosts. Are you ready for some bike racing?

name: Turbo Tempest
summary: A Multiplayer Speedboat Battle Arena where you fight to be the last boat standing using a range on weapons on the map.

name: Tugboat Terror
summary: A frantic and exciting task-management adventure game where you play as Alessandro, a fish with human legs, and pilot a tugboat through a dangerous swamp of radioactive monsters.

name: Tunnels of Doom
summary:
One of the first graphical computer role-playing games, Tunnels of Doom puts the players in control of up to four characters in a single party, to explore the dangerous Tunnels of Doom, fight monsters, and collect treasure. The four characters can be controlled by one player as a party, or by up to four players, each choosing an action during battles.

There are four different character classes available: Fighter, Rogue, Wizard, and Hero. The latter can be selected only if he is the only character in the party. Enemies appear randomly, and the battles are turn-based. Various treasure is scattered around the dungeon; the player also has the option of buying certain equipment. In some places, fountains can be found; drinking from them will affect the party in different ways, positive or negative.

name: Tune Cruiser
summary:
Tune Cruiser is a new way to explore the iPod library on your device. Tap along with your favourite tunes and increase your score with every tap you hit.
Can you hear the underlying patterns in your favorite songs? Tune Cruiser will put your musical abilities to the test! Import any of the songs on your computer or mobile device, find the beat, and tap your phone along with the rhythm to earn points. Tune Cruiser will change the way you listen to the tunes you've heard a hundred times before and get you hearing them in a whole new way.

name: Turbo Racing
summary: Versions of Al Unser Jr.'s Turbo Racing released outside North America were simply titled Turbo Racing with all references to Unser removed, due to the relative obscurity of CART and Unser outside of North America.

name: TublerVR
summary:
TublerVR is a game designed for virtual reality. It's up to you to help the tublers to grow and collect the rare blue mushroom. Activate bridges with a simple touch and allow the tublers a save passage. 
 
Save the tublers!

name: Turf Wars
summary: Turf Wars is a chaotic top-down local multiplayer shooter that takes place in dynamic crime-shaped ghetto environments. Packed with action, hazards, and explosions that will keep you on the edge of the seat. Take control of the wacky gangsters and clash against your friends in an all out mayhem!

name: Tummy Bonbons: The Sweet Monster
summary: Eat candy. Get spookier. Scare children into giving you their candy. Eat it. Choose new bellies. Then eat more candy, as much as you can!

name: Turn Tack
summary: A world on the verge of doom, and the girl who holds the key. An exotic puzzle-platformer adventure game based on Aztec myth in South America.

name: Turnover
summary: In a dystopian future, a powerful corporation hires a private security firm to execute a violent takeover of a competitor's HQ. Caught in the middle, brave office worker Clea attempts a stealthy escape.

name: Turma do Arrepio: Grand Prix
summary: Come and participate in the most terrifying car competition with the characters from A Turma do Arrepio.

name: TUS
summary: TUS is a fun, fast-paced shooter for you and your friends to play!

name: Tunnels of Terror
summary: As a sewer maintenance worker, your mission is to explore, solve puzzles and battle your way through a treacherous sewer network and uncover clues about fellow co-workers that have mysteriously vanished in the depths.

name: Turbo Turtle Adventure
summary: Help Turbo Turtle win his freedom to once again swim the sea. Trapped on the 'Isle of Mazes' you must guide Turbo Turtle through deceitful labyrinths and nasty traps. Collect keys to unlock doorways, avoid the super magnets and utilize the turbo boost feature to try and beat your fastest time. This innovative title blends the basic balancing act of Super Monkey Ball with the mind-bending key-and-switch puzzles found in the Zelda games.

name: Turtle Ship
summary: The game is a typical space shooter that plays horizontally or vertically depending on the level. Three buttons per player: guns, missiles and special. Special is a super weapon which kills all but the most powerful enemies.

name: Tutel Quest
summary: After passing out from a rough night, Vedal is suddenly awakened by Neuro calling out for help. Before he can figure out what to do, a hand reaches out from his screen and pulls him into the digital world, then quickly loses its grasp. Vedal and Neuro have now lost one another, trapped somewhere on the Internet. Play as Vedal, navigating your way through a strange world full of traps and puzzles. Can you help him find Neuro?

name: Tube Panic
summary:
Tube Panic was produced by Nichibutsu in 1984.

Nichibutsu released 80 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1979.

Other machines made by Nichibutsu during the time period Tube Panic was produced include Roller Jammer, Pastel Gal, Ninja Emaki, Dangar Ufo Robo, Cop 01, Dacholer, Skelagon, Nichibutsu Hustler, Rug Rats, and Constella.

name: Tuiterland 0rigins
summary: Live the traves of the main three superusers of the series and the motives behind their outcomes! Discover the origins of many of the iconic characters of the series and visit new regions formerly never seen in this prequel set 10 years before the events of Tuiterland 1!

name: Tuiterland 4
summary:
Explore the vast region of 4chan, discover all of its secrets and discover new and extravagant characters in this new entry of the Tuiterland saga! Tuiterland 4 has a clear distinction from the rest of the series: we don't visit Twitter at any time!

Even though it only has one playable region, 4chan is the vastest region of the Social Network Contintent, as it was revealed in Tuiterland 3 and Tuiterland 0rigins, so there's no need to worry about not having enough places to explore!

What mysteries will you find? What unpredictable situations will happen? How is the story connected to the other entries? All of this and much more will be discovered in this new entry, the new generation of the Tuiterland saga!

Tuiterland 4 has been developed to be the ultimate Tuiterland experience, being the game with most story cutscenes, lots of side content in terms of stories and map exploration and the most refined combat system. We hope you like it!

The game can be played on Android using the free emulator "JoiPlay" available on Google Play Store, but slight visual glitches may appear.

name: Turbo Bullets
summary: They call you Driver because you are the fastest in the market. One day you fall into a police ambush and get an offer you can't refuse - you are to become a police plug. Go undercover to race, shoot and smash a criminal group organizing an illegal "Lethal Tournament". Will you be able to survive?

name: Tuber`s Run
summary: Tuber`s Run is a runner game with unique characters. All characters has their own unique abilities and there is a level up system. Can you Run/Climb/Fight trough different game types and reach to the end?

name: Turok
summary:
Turok is a first-person shooter developed by Propaganda Games, and published by Touchstone Games and Disney Interactive Studios, originally for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in February 2008. It was later ported on to Microsoft Windows in April 2008. A sequel was planned and developed for the Xbox 360 but it was cancelled before it was even officially announced.

The game is loosely based on the comic book series of the same title and is unrelated to the story and setting of previous Turok video games. Players assume the role of Native American space marine Joseph Turok, who is part of a team sent to a remote planet to apprehend his previous commanding officer, General Roland Kane, now a wanted war criminal. After crash landing, Turok discovers this planet is home to all manner of dinosaurs, and must fight both the predatory creatures and Kane's private army on his mission to take down his former mentor.

name: Turtle Jump
summary: Ekim the giant ant has to return his treasure to his island.

name: Tunnel View
summary:
Puzzle your way through only one dimension. Solve some colour shenanigans, navigate the limited space and bend the dimension using mirrors.
Solve 14 stages, then get one of two endings. The game explores trust, blindness and the importance of grey area, but for all of that, you'll need to see both endings.

name: TurBot
summary: TurBot is a fast paced race to the finish where you'll combine a wide selection of movement options and power ups to reach the goal faster than anyone else!

name: Tumble Rush
summary: A fast-paced marble maze that you control by tilting your device. Frantically tumble through physics-based tricks and traps.

name: Turn your Destiny
summary: Turn Your Destiny is a new addictive Match-4-or-more puzzle game. Solve each level and control your destiny!

name: Turbo Fast
summary: A mobile racing game based off the hit Netflix series Turbo Fast

name: Turmoil
summary: Bug Byte's Turmoil is a platform game where Mick The Mechanic steals the sheik's cars, collecting oil while avoiding Arabian bodyguards. Through 26 screens with hazards like springboards and disappearing walls, Mick's goal is to pour oil into the grid, gradually revealing and increasing the value of the hidden cars. Special bonuses can be obtained by collecting tools.

name: Tunnel Madness
summary: Try to put the cars in the correct tunnel !

name: Turma do Chico Bento
summary: Turma do Chico Bento was a social farm simulation game developed by Insolita Studios and published by Level Up! in partnership with Mauricio de Sousa Produções. In the game, the player needed to take care of his farm, planting and taking care of the animals, while participating in adventures as if he were in a story of Chico Bento, the “caipirinha” created by Mauricio de Sousa.

name: Tubelive
summary: Be the ultimate gamer and become famous on U-TUBE universe. Manage your channel! Play tons of fun minigames! Destroy the 7 evil streamers to get your crush! Build an empire in your room! This is Tubelive!

name: Turrican III
summary: After many generations of peace, the Dark Forces have assembled again, and as a member of the USS Freedom Forces, it is your job to defeat them once again. This means you will have to complete numerous large levels always searching for secrets to pick up and enemies to shoot. To do this, you can pick up three different, upgradeable shots: a multiple, a laser and a rebound. You can also go into wheel-mode (as long as you have enough special energy) or use a rope. In wheel-mode, you are invincible and can lay mines or explore previously unreachable areas.

name: Turbo Dash Kart 2023 Racing
summary: Race to Glory, Race to Win – it's time to conquer the track!

name: Tunnels & Trolls: Crusaders of Khazan
summary: Explore the world of Crusaders of Khazan with your party from a top-down perspective, roaming wilderness areas, visiting towns, talking to people, receiving quests, and descending into dungeons. Battles take place on a top-down battle screen, on which characters can move freely and attack enemies in turn-based style.

name: Turbo Grid
summary:
In a far distant future, racing has evolved into a whole new dimension. Super fast space ships replaced traditional vehicles and gone all the known roads with new kind of challenge on a deep space racing track. It's dangerous as well, so are you up to this challenge?
Turbo Grid is a fast paced racing / shooting experience setup in a ray like race track. Your aim is to go as far as you can with simply tapping each side of the screen to dodge from the obstacles. Your ship is fast, but becomes faster with speed up sections during the race. You should also collect gun item to get shooting capability in order to clean your way. Shield item can be usefull to collect as it'll help you in any of your dodge mistake. Boost takes your ship's speed into another level where you can fly over many obstacles at a glance. Orbs are the currency in this future, so collect them as much as you can and also a magnet item can help you ease in this purpose.

name: Turtle Head: Unmasked
summary: A remake of the game Turtle Head (Originially by Pikasprey) created by Team Meatpie.

name: Turret Defense: Bug Invasion
summary: Man the turrets! Bugs are invading Earth and you're the only one left to stop them in this arcade-style endless game. Chase high scores and don't get overwhelmed in Turret Defense: Bug Invasion!

name: Turtle Rush
summary: Turtle Rush is a top down hardcore (difficult) platformer. The story follows one turtles journey to uncover the mystery of why the seagulls have taken or killed the majority of the worlds turtles. Join Oscar Green in his travel through 10 levels and 30 more challenge levels.

name: Turret Tech
summary: "Turret Tech" is a confrontation among high-tech self-propelled machines in the struggle for excellence in resource-rich sectors.

name: TurbOT Racing
summary:
TurbOT Racing is an underground robot race competition sponsored by a big corporation.
In the role of an Advanced AI your goal is to drive a powerful robotic system in races that will both challenge your response time and perception of the environment.

name: Turret Architect
summary: A Cookie Clicker type of game, where the Buildings actually exist in the 3d world.

name: Turgor Pressure
summary: After a dive team sent to explore an abandoned facility goes missing, you are tasked with piloting a ROV down below the surface of the ocean to see if you can track them down and either guide them back up, or at least confirm that they're dead. Your ROV is equipped with a scanning system to help you determine what may have happened to the team. Good luck out there, and remember: Something's wrong with the ocean.

name: Turkey Hunting USA
summary:
An arcade shooting game about hunting turkeys.

This game has five different states from which to select: Florida, New Mexico, Montana, Pennsylvania and Kansas. Each of the states has a different weather condition and level of difficulty. If a player achieves a top-ten raking in one of the states, he or she will become a grand slam master. There are also four different weapons to choose from: rifle, shotgun, power bow and muzzleloader.

Bonus stages allow players to test their hunting skills. Obtaining a perfect score during one of these stages awards the player with different turkey calls or decoys.

name: Turtoa: Global Rhythm
summary: Feel the rhythm of exotic cultures and amazing instruments in this beautiful aquatic world music game.

name: Turrican Flashback
summary:
Turrican Flashback brings together 4 of the greatest titles in the series with Turrican, Turrican II: The Final Fight, Mega Turrican and Super Turrican all in one package!
New reworked controls makes the classic home computer classics an ease to pick up and play, welcoming new and old fans to relive the classic with the touch of a button. Additionally, new filters and dynamic on screen elements allows players to customize their experience, going full "Retro" or enjoy the game in full widescreen with minimal on-screen HUD elements. All this with crystal clear and perfectly rendered audio playback of the classic soundtracks and sound effects!

name: Turncoat Chronicle
summary: Your father stole his throne, intending to leave it to you. When the long-lost heir resurfaces, will you defend the king—or betray him to his enemies?

name: Tunneling 2048
summary: Tunneling 2048 is a variant of 2048 but extra spaces are created every time a new number is added up.

name: Turtle Quest
summary: Turtle Quest is a game based on a baby turtle hatching from its egg and needing to get to the sea.

name: Turandot
summary: An operatic performance. A tale of atonement. A dating sim with a crocodile pit.

name: Turpedo
summary: A fast paced 2-4 multiplayer party game where players incarnate submarines for victory over polluted oceans. Evolve as you play with a range of mutations in round based combat over multiple game modes.

name: Tubedle
summary: A webgame that lets you see how well you know your favorite youtubers

name: Tuk Tuk Extreme: Real Car Driving Simulator & Parking 2023 Car Games 3D Vehicle
summary: Have you ever drive a Tuk Tuk at max speed through the mountains and dangerous parts of the road? If not, then enter the world of speed lovers, because the hottest curves are waiting for you.

name: Turro 2022
summary: Just finish the race and be winner!

name: Turbo the Tortoise
summary: An action platformer starring Turbo the Tortoise.

name: Tuggowar
summary: Tuggowar is the big-brain deckbuilding duel. Engage in tense combat on a solarpunk frontier. Assemble your deck turn by turn, discover powerful card combos, disrupt the enemy strategy, and pilot your well-oiled war machine to victory!

name: Tumblefire
summary: Prepare for a good old fashioned heist in this simulated and fully burnable old west world. Burn down walls with torches or use explosives to create shortcuts. Stack coffins and cow skulls to reach higher. Use the world around you to help you in every way you can imagine.

name: Turbo OutRun
summary:
The sequel to OutRun features similar basic gameplay to the original, with the action viewed from behind the car, and the challenge being to complete each stage within the time limit. Contact can cause the car to spin, slow down or even flip; in each case you will lose time.

There are 16 stages set across the US, gradually moving from east to west, all depicted differently visually. After every 4 levels, you go into a shop screen, with a choice of upgrades. As the title implies, you now have a turbo booster installed, which speeds up the car, although over-use can cause the engine to overheat, and it is not recharged until each shop section. You have 5 continues, and failure to complete the course within the time limit costs you one.

name: Turok: Battle of the Bionosaurs
summary: Turok: Battle of the Bionosaurs is an action platformer Game Boy adaptation of Turok: Dinosaur Hunter, developed by Bit Managers and published by Acclaim.

name: Tunguska: A Call in the Woods
summary: Make your way through dense Siberian woods in search of a missing person in this path-finding survival adventure. Compass and map included.

name: Turn right
summary: Very simple and easy games

name: Turnabout for Human Rights
summary: You play as defense attorney Evan Denceforge. He goes on an adventure with his friend to go on a ghost hunt and ride shopping carts or whatever. They stop doing it, however, because of a stool.

name: TunsTan
summary: A cartoon style side-scroller action/strategy RPG. Raise a warband of tumbleweeds to lead into battle and command and fight alongside them. Explore the world, craft items, and lead your warband to the adventure!

name: Turtle Fly: Into Space
summary:
As the first flying turtle, you must use your cola-powered jet-boosters to fly your way to the moon!
If you ever want to make it to outer space, you will need to upgrade everything from your main engine and boosters, to your hat and air resistance. Collect more valuable diamonds as you fly higher, and use them to purchase as many upgrades as you can afford.
Earn achievements as you reach faster speeds, higher heights, and earn more money. Eventually, you will leave behind your cola-powered jet-boosters in exchange for solar energy, and who knows after that.

name: Turbo Soccer VR
summary: Be like Kamil Grosicki! Put on VR goggles and feel like a professional soccer player, scoring goals or saving your team from losing them. Enter a virtual pitch and put a spectacular finishing touch, shoot free kicks and penalties, pass with deadly precision!

name: Turnabout of the Final Day
summary:
The Final Day is coming.

Losing someone... dear to you, will always make our life hell for a long time. The pain can heal, new memories can be crafted, but scars, remains.

This is a story about how Athena Cykes, the young attorney, started to lose Everything, and how she deals with it... Or tries to.

name: Tuby Bird
summary: Tuby Bird is a clone of the Activision title, Dolphin. The difference in this game is that, instead of playing as a dolphin trying to avoid a squid, you play as a small bird while trying to avoid a bird of prey.

name: Turnabout Reality
summary: Phoenix Wright must defend a man accused of attacking his daughter in front of school grounds. Facing off against an unfamiliar prosecutor, Phoenix discovers that things aren't exactly as they seem in this case. Or in this world, for that matter.

name: Turnabout Retribution
summary:
The road to hell is paved with good intentions...

Kristoph Gavin is willing to go to hell and back in order to get his revenge on Phoenix Wright.

Even if it means making a deal to get it...

Even if it means getting entangled in the most diabolical court case he's ever seen...

But even then, will he succeed?

name: Turnabout of Courage
summary: A Ace Attorney fan case inspired by "Hag's Nook" and "The Case of the Constant Suicides" by John Dickson Carr. Set in a alternative universe with Mia and Phoenix investigating a case.

name: Turrican Anthology Vol. 1
summary:
Turrican Anthology Vol. 1 includes:

- Turrican (Amiga)
- Turrican 2 (Amiga)
- Super Turrican (SNES)
- Super Turrican Director's Cut (SNES)
- Mega Turrican Score Attack (Mega Drive)
- 2 incredible soundtracks to choose from, the original game sound as well as the remaster studio track by Chris Huelsbeck.

name: Tub Defenders
summary:
A gang of mutant monsters fled the lab of "mutant aquatic animals"
After swimming through the drain pipes they found them selves in the kid's swimming pool and it felt kinda nice.
So they decided to stay and scared all the kids away.
Tap on the monsters to scare them away. But be real careful with the black crab monster it will get really angry.

name: Tunnel Adventure
summary: Tunnel Adventure is an exciting and addictive game that challenges players to guide a paper airplane through a perilous tunnel.

name: Turok Trilogy Bundle
summary:
Turok is back and no dinosaur is safe! When it was first released in 1997, Turok introduced gamers to a world teeming with cunning enemies, traps, puzzles and deadly weapons all within a vast 3D environment ready to explore.
Now the classic game has been restored and enhanced with a new visual engine and exciting new features to sink your teeth into!

name: Turbo Light Rush
summary: Automatic Run&Gun containing 12 levels with retro-futuristic aesthetics. Make the best score !

name: Tumble Ball
summary: Tumble Ball is a 3D-cubic maze solver with a simple goal; find the exit. Navigate complicated labyrinths in various shapes and sizes, and compete with people from all over the world, for your place on the leaderboards.

name: Turkey Stuffin'
summary: Turkey Stuffin' is a mobile game where players are tasked with cramming ingredients into a live turkey's butt.

name: Tumbled
summary: indie puzzle game, where you tumbled your way to the portal, without missing the platforms.

name: Turing Trial
summary: A Short, Replayable Text-Based RPG

name: Tuneland
summary: Tuneland is a musical children's computer game, produced in 1993 by a division of 7th Level, Kids' World Entertainment. The cartoon video game follows the character Little Howie, who is voiced by the television personality Howie Mandel on an adventure around Old McDonald's Farm.

name: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator
summary: Turn and Burn: The F-14 Dogfight Simulator is a Simulation game, developed by Imagineering Inc and published by Absolute Entertainment, which was released in 1992.

name: Tunics!
summary: Tunics! is a Rogue-like Legend of Zelda quest. It means it’s only dungeons, and they are randomly generated. Moreover, once you’re dead, you’ll have to restart from the beginning, losing all your improvements (weapons, health, etc). It should be considered a well-polished proof-of-concept.

name: Turing Quest
summary: A party game where up to six players compete against a hilarious AI to write jokes. Using a phone or tablet as a controller, players vote on whether the AI or human players can be more entertaining. The game is designed to be played on a TV, a large monitor, or screen share for remote play.

name: Tunnel Ball 3D
summary:
The fastest and most furious 3D Tunnel game on the AppStore.
Roll your galactic ball down the 3D tunnel at light speed. Avoid obstacles and grab space treasures to maximize your scores.

name: Tutelary
summary: A rather advanced platformer where an angel must collect coins; the angel can fly, but can only flap her wings up to three times in one jump.

name: Tusmo
summary: Tusmo is a word-game like Wordle but using the french TV show Motus rules. You can play it with your friends or by yourself.

name: Turn on the lights! Brain Game
summary: Enjoy this new and exciting puzzle game!

name: Turtle Odyssey 2
summary: During and innocent game of catch, Ozzy accidentally smacks into a slab of ice, cracking it open and releasing a mysterious creature. Intrigued, he unknowingly sets off on the journey of a lifetime.

name: Tubular Worlds
summary: You are a senior cadet at the country's elite school for fighter pilots. Your final exam involves flying the gauntlet of four virtual cyber worlds and destroying the Warlords encountered there. Be warned! At the end of each combat segment a very powerful Warlord will be waiting for you! The sixteen major encounters require complete concentration and will test your ability to the limit.

name: Tunguska: Legend of Faith
summary: Join Jack Riley on his journey through another dimension, as he struggles to overcome the forces of darkness and unlock the secrets of the Castle under the Order of Tunguska. The action, adventures and riddles will draw you inside this extraordinary gaming experience. Tunguska -- stay alive and play for your future destiny.

name: Turbo 64
summary: A racing simulator for Commodore 64.

name: Turbo Cat Fight
summary: Turbo Cat Fight is an oddball pixel-perfect fighting game. Both players get to choose their loadouts and they fight it out! Challenge your friend to an ultimate showdown of an earthshaking fist trade!

name: Tunnel VR
summary: Like racing trough endless tunnels in space? Then look no further, this is the game for you. Because it is all about racing. In a tunnel. In space.

name: Turbo 84
summary: Can you reach 100 mph? How about 200 mph? Drive as fast as you can through this insane lane changing game. Just try not to crash on your way to reaching your top speed!

name: Tunnel Hero 3D
summary:
A game in which a car passes through a ladder-shaped maze in a tunnel.
​

name: Turn and Burn: No-Fly Zone
summary: In Turn and Burn: No-Fly Zone the player gets in the cockpit of the famed F-14 Tomcat and launches into a series of sorties on enemy fighters. The game is a simulation with real instruments and gauges and authentic weapons such as Sidewinders, Phoenix missiles and the M61A1 Vulcan Cannon to shoot down enemy fighters scattered throughout the stages. Players also land on their carrier in both daytime and night time missions. The game also features Mode 7 scaling.

name: Turbo Boat Simulator
summary: Not really a simulation...

name: Tube-It
summary: Players attempt to stack tubes to complete them in this puzzle arcade game from Taito.

name: Turgul: Rapid Fighting
summary: A new story fighting game awaits to be played. Turgul: Rapid Fighting will bring your fighting game experience to a whole new level.

name: Turkey Shoot
summary: Shoot 'em up

name: Turbo Maze Man
summary: The player controls a Pac-Man like creature in a maze trying to eat all the pellets. Four ghosts are released from their homes, and will chase the player if approached too close. Power pellets in the corners of the screen will temporarily send the ghosts back to their homes. If the player clears a level, they advance to a more difficult challenge. The player starts with 5 lives, and it's game over when all are lost.

name: Tunnel Vision
summary: A disorienting arcade style "shooter" where you need to make your shot count because you only get one as well as you control its trajectory in an attempt to reach your target. Avoid obstacles, smash bonus targets and reach the end of the level without crashing in this bullet bending title.

name: Tube Slider
summary:
Race around fast and futuristic race tracks in some of the most high tech cars ever created. Each hover craft has the ability to get to very high speeds at a simple touch of a button, while side boosters allow you to take sharp turns at full tilt and turbo (if you really want to go even faster) gives you an added boost for a short amount of time.

The 10 tracks on offer can be completed either in Grand Prix, Time Trial or Free Ride modes. Grand Prix has you competing one race after the other for the grand prize. The higher you finish, the better the chance to progress and win the title.

name: Tube Rolling
summary: A fast-paced arcade ball rolling in a tube in which you have to dodge obstacles, unlock new skins, and constantly improve your latest score.

name: Turtle Tale
summary: Turtle Tale is an action adventure game by Saturnine Games available for the Nintendo eShop

name: Turn on the Light
summary: Turn On The Light is a minimalist puzzle game.

name: Tuff Stuff
summary:
A new adventure - inspired by Ape Escape!
Help Ronny and Bri catch these adorable stuffed animals that have suddenly come to life. FYI, they're really aggressive for some reason. So maybe not so adorable? Go get 'em.

name: Turret Jumper 2
summary: Action-Parkour-Shooter game with time control

name: Turbo League
summary:
Combine our Real-time physics with your driving skills and propel yourself through your opponents to blast the goal.
First time ever combine the fun of soccer with racing adrenaline in a mobile game

name: Tuzaq
summary: Tuzaq is a non-linear visual novel in the genre of adventure.A sweet story about a cruel girl. Or... is it a cruel story that has disfigured a sweet girl?

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Space Explorer's Galactic Ball Set
summary:
Go boldly where no racer has gone before, with the Space Explorer's Galactic Ball Set.
After purchase, these items will appear in the Garage section of Turbo Golf Racing.

name: Tungulus
summary: The protagonist descends into the basement of a new house, and finds there horrifying things that can shock many...

name: TurtleQuest
summary: TurtleQuest is a 2D-Platformer where you are sent on a quest to save your little turtle village from an unknown disease. You have to follow an ancient path through the old mountains, riddled with bewitched traps, to find the sacred plant Zingiber, which might help to cure all turtles.

name: Tumble
summary: Tumble is a 2D indie action-platformer set in a dangerous world where humanity is forced to live underground. Fight countless enemies and bosses, uncover a deep storyline and rescue those you value most... if you can make it all the way down.

name: Turtles, Huh?: Learn to Fly
summary:
Turtles, Huh? The game has 1 Main game and 9 Mini-games. The game has 2 characters: Turtle and Penguin. The game has 88 missions and 40 achievements. The game is so much fun that you will find challenging in all the nine games.
Mini-games: The games are designed for the mini-game lovers. You will find challenging in the games. Can you get grade "A"s in all the mini-games?
Main game: 88 missions are waiting for you to complete! Upgrade your equipments, fly as far as possible, Destroy all the obstacles and get all 7 Turtle Balls. Huh? What are the Turtle Balls? The legend said when someone gets all the 7 balls, he will get the power to conquer the world!

name: Turn the mirror, please.
summary: This is a minimalist puzzle game.

name: Turkey Hunting Unlimited
summary: Get ready to hit the Spring time woods and Hunt Turkey! The Gobblers are out there and depending on the difficulty level you choose it can be a "Gobble Fest" or a more realistic hunt! Hunt four states: New York, Ohio, Kansas, and Texas! Hunt with a Gun or a Bow!

name: Tuned Heart
summary: You are assigned to supervise and lead a group known as Tuned Heart, which fights crime on city streets. The members of the group are all young and pretty girls, and also experts in firearms and vehicles. Mysterious mind-controlling criminals have appeared in America, and now cities are overrun by biker gangs and other criminals. It's time for the hero to assemble his group and show those criminals who is the boss!

name: Tulip
summary: You are a very sad bunny. You cannot stop crying. You might have to drink something gross. You are Tulip. Wander through a storybook countryside, gather ingredients for a strange brew, and get to know your adorable animal neighbors in an odd quest to alleviate your incurable sadness.

name: Turncoat Protocol
summary: Duty Awaits - Even In Death

name: Tune Her Out
summary: Successfully avoid your nagging girlfriend and beat the level.

name: Tuk Tuk Extreme Simulator
summary: Have you ever drive a Tuk Tuk at max speed through the mountains and dangerous parts of the road?

name: Turtle VR
summary: Turtle VR brings the Logo turtle into the 21st century. Use an interface similar to MIT Scratch, and Google Blockly, to program a turtle to draw your creations within various 3D worlds.

name: Turrican 3
summary: After many generations of peace, the Dark Forces have assembled again, and as a member of the USS Freedom Forces, it is your job to defeat them once again. This means you will have to complete numerous large levels always searching for secrets to pick up and enemies to shoot. To do this, you can pick up three different, upgradeable shots: a multiple, a laser and a rebound. You can also go into wheel-mode (as long as you have enough special energy) or use a rope. In wheel-mode, you are invincible and can lay mines or explore previously unreachable areas.

name: Turtle Bridge
summary: Toad delivers items from Mario to Princess Peach by using a bridge of Goonies, which sometimes dive at passing balloons. The name of the minigame is from the original game, which involved a bridge made of turtles.

name: Turbo Trot
summary:
Strap on your jodhpurs and prepare yourself for one horse racing.
Trot out your best horse jumping skills in this super gallop-y arcade classic.

name: Tusker's Number Adventure
summary: Tusker's Number Adventure is a unique adventure/puzzle experience, featuring software glitches, malware alerts and unauthorised file transfers!

name: Turbo trucks
summary:
Turbo Trucks is an aggressive, no-holds-barred race to the finish line featuring a line up of some seriously mean vehicles

Set across winding woodland courses and remote desert canyons, you get to choose from a selection of gorgeous trucks and take on opponents in successive races to earn coveted trophies in the tournaments, or hone your driving skills in the quick races and time trials
Win the tournaments to gain access to more courses and trucks!
Ram, smash and spin your opponents off the track while perfecting your racing line to gain the upper hand

name: Turbo Fiesta
summary: Third in the hugely popular Turbo series, Turbo Fiesta is what happens when south of the border cuisine takes on an interplanetary trajectory. An astronomical and gastronomical adventure, Turbo Fiesta is truly out of this world! Rebecca and Robert are taking their fast food empire to totally new heights. Serve interplanetary customers in spectacular, far-out locations and watch your fast food empire skyrocket.

name: Turbo Sprint Racing
summary: Race, skid, slide and Nitro your way around 17 tracks in this retro style 2D top down racer!

name: Tuiterland 3
summary: Everything you need to know about Tuiterland 3, the biggest playable parody on social media!

name: Tumble Tundra
summary: Tumble Tundra is a Foddian Platformer where you must escape a mysterious crevice that you've fallen into. Will you be able to make it to the top?

name: Turing Tumble VR
summary: Build mechanical computers and watch marbles drive them. See data processing happening, witness how cleverly arranged switches create all basic functions of a microprocessor, invent ways to add, compare, divide, multiply, substract, do logic, create patterns and much more through the 59 puzzles!

name: Tusk of Spirit
summary: A plot driven 2D RPG about a young girl uncovering a deceptive government plot while attempting to fulfill her master's dying wishes

name: Turn the Fight
summary: "Turn the Fight" is a Turn-Based Beat'em Up Game.

name: Turok 2
summary: The sequel to the 2008 reboot of the Turok series, cancelled after Propaganda Games went defunct in late 2009.

name: Tumble
summary: Third-person Open World Adventure Exploration Game, About a Little Boy In Search of His Elder Brother

name: Tunnel Hunt
summary: You are shooting down enemy space ships while chasing them through a tunnel.

name: Turn-Based Bundle
summary: Including five turn-based strategy games published by Goblinz!

name: Turn on the Light: Jigsaw
summary: A minimalist game about connecting circuits, solving jigsaw puzzles and mind-bending recursive circuits.

name: Turbo Sub
summary: Turbo Sub released in 1985 as an arcade shooter game by Entertainment Sciences. Then later in 1991 for the Atari Lynx. The arcade version was a one player game set in the future where you control a submersible ship against a horde of aliens. The Atari Lynx version is the same but can be played with two players and tells us the story is set in the 28th century on Earth. The planet has been invaded and the goal of the game is that the player must destroy all the aliens.

name: Turnabout Detectives
summary: Turnabout Detectives is a big ol' tale that features Detective Gumshoe as the defendant! However, the plot twists and turns and soon things are a lot worse for more than just Gumshoe...

name: Turnabout Detectives Redux
summary: A remake of Turnabout Detectives, with new a script, improved audio and visuals.

name: Turnabout Mugging
summary: Turnabout Mugging is about the intense faceoff between Dougal Justice, a rookie defense attorney who is defending his first case, and Alexander Chevalier, a determined prosecutor who always believes in his witnesses.

name: Turnabout in the Spotlight
summary: If you were suddenly thrust into the spotlight, would you shine or would you fizzle out?

name: Turnpike
summary: A (very loose) remake of the classic Duke 3D episode 3 secret level by Allen Blum, "Freeway", originally started during a Duke4.net "mappening"

name: Turbo Cup
summary: Thrill to the excitement of Championship Sports Car racing! Drive at speeds in excess of 120 MPH!! Practice on each course first, before competing in a head to head race. Turbo Cup Challenge features accurate representations of four of the most exciting race tracks in Europe - MAGNY-COURS, DIJON-PRENOIS, NOGARO, and PAUL RICARD. You would never have believed that a computer could so accurately recreate all the excitement and danger of top class motor racing!!

name: Tug-of-War: Cybertruck
summary: Rev up your engines! It's time to see, once and for all, what the Cybertruck can really do! Measure up to multiple challengers, test your skills in different settings and environments, upgrade your truck and take down the competition in one epic tug-of-war.

name: Tutorial
summary:
If you’ve never played interactive fiction before, or have poked at a few games but didn’t feel like you really knew what you were doing, start here.

A short text adventure guided towards helping newcomers to the genre understand the rules and nature of IF.

name: Turok 2
summary: A large temple complex containing several structures divided by caves and jungle valleys.

name: Turbo Tunnel
summary: Avoid obstacles as you accelerate through an endless tunnel of pain and destruction. What could go wrong?

name: Tubocity
summary: Tubocity is an endless runner where players pilot a spaceship through a tube, avoiding oncoming gates blocking their path.

name: Turtle Run: Crood Islands of Oz
summary: Adventure with the fastest Turtle in Oz! Race him across the islands to reach the tower in this fun filled runner. Beware of nasty wizards and goblins! Will you make it out of Oz?

name: Tunnels of Despair
summary:
Tunnels of Despair is an atmospheric horror game with elements of survival where you will have to explore underground tunnels, trying to find a way out and rescue yourself. 
You were sent to check on a long-abandoned underground tunnel, which at first appeared to be a standard task...

name: Tunshi Unifying Plains
summary: "The Conquest of China" is a RPG role-playing game centered around Liu Bei of the Shu Kingdom. Unlike other Three Kingdoms RPGs, the game does not start with the usual storyline, but instead begins with the murder of Liu's mother by the Yellow Turban Rebellion, setting Liu on a path of revenge.

name: Turma da Mônica em O Resgate
summary: Turma da Mônica em O Resgate is a fan-made mod for 2017's Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap that remakes the 1993's regional port of the original game, in which Monica gets raptured by Captain Fray after entering the Dragon's Castle and now their friends must save her.

name: Turochamp
summary:
Turochamp is a chess program developed by Alan Turing and David Champernowne in 1948. It was created as part of research by the pair into computer science and machine learning. Turochamp is capable of playing an entire chess game against a human player at a low level of play by calculating all potential moves and all potential player moves in response, as well as some further moves it deems considerable. It then assigns point values to each game state, and selects the move resulting in the highest point value.
